body.name: COMFEE' 4 Slice Small Toaster Oven Countertop, Retro Compact Design, Multi-Function with 30-Minute Timer, Bake, Broil, Toast, 1000 Watts, 2-Rack Capacity, Black (CFO-BB101)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【3 IN ONE VERSATILE COOKING FUCTIONS】Bake, Broil and a Toast all in a mini compact toaster oven to fit your daily cooking needs.

【SPACE SAVER WITH 2 RACK CAPACITY】 The Compact and versatile design of COMFEE' countertop toaster oven can fit nicely in any small spaces when counter space is limited with comfort stretch and articulated knees. 2 Rack Levels make toaster ovens countertop holds 2 to 4 slices of bread, 9'' pizza, enough for a family.

【EASY-TO-USE BUILT IN TIMER】The 30-Minute-Timer includes precise toast shade preference and stay-on feature for longer baking tasks. This compact toaster oven has simple controls that are straightforward and easy to use.

【WIDE TEMPERATURE RANGE & INTUITIVE OPERATION DIALS】150°F to 450°F lets you cook with the convenience of different type of foods.Two easy to use dials can not only let you set your preferred cooking time, but also make you easy to control temperature and cookingmodes.
【3 USEFUL ACCESSORIES & EASY TO CLEAN】Small toaster ovens countertop comes with 3 accessories: Non-stick Baking Rack, Baking Pan and detachable Crumb Tray, allows for effortless cleaning.
【ONE-YEAR LONG WARRANTY】1-Year Warranty & A lifetime technical consultation, all problems with your toaster oven will be solved professionally.
Space Saver - Compact and versatile design fits nicely on any countertop

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The compact size is ideal for apartment kitchens, vacation homes, offices and dorms. COMFEE' is a trusted brand in small kitchen appliances. As a professional manufacturer of small appliances, we are committed to building better products that add convenience, and enhanced experiences for a value-driven customer. Comfee Toaster Oven Internal dimensions (L*W*H): 10.2’’ x 9.1’’ x 6.5’’ Fits 4 slices of toast and a 10.2’’ x 7.8’’ bake pan External dimensions (L*W*H): 14.6” x 11.4” x8.0’’ Power: 1000 Watts Temperature control: 150°F - 450°F Timer: 30 Minutes

Easy to Cook This oven offers 3 popular cooking functions - Bake, Toast and Broil. Choose toast to toast garlic bread or to make your favorite Bagels, English Muffins, and Waffles. The broiling feature is great for meat and vegetables. Chicken Nuggets, Mozzarella Sticks, Egg Rolls, Mini Quiches or whatever you’re craving. All done in your toaster oven. Easy to Operate Two dials to control everything. The upper dial controls the temperature and the cooking modes. The lower dial features the precise 30-minute timer with stay-on mode allowing for a longer baking time. You can also get the perfect slice of toast by selecting the shade you prefer. Easy to Clean You can keep the toaster oven clean with the convenient detachable crumb tray. Tilt the unit backwards slightly and push the dial on the tray towards the rear of the unit. The crumb tray will drop open and allow for cleaning. Dual Position Rack Place food right under the broiler or make room for large items. The upper position is typically for broiling while the lower position is best for baking and toasting. High and low oven rack positions provide the versatility to have great results for all foods.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Manual Settings Rock
reviews.reviewText: This replaces a countertop air fryer toaster oven that had computerized controls and was a complete PITA to use. We were so happy when it failed, which sent us back to hunt for a mechanical control version.We bought this particular machine because it has all manual controls, an on/off light switch that stays on until turned off and, BONUS, a rotisserie that has a basket, which we use to roast nuts and soy beans. Included are the usual pans, racks and air fryer basket, along with the rotisserie bar and its basket.The current huge Amazon discount also helped with our decision. We basically bought 2 for 1 when compared to a Cuisinart, which doesn't have the rotisserie basket and didn't last any longer than these imports. Our previous similar Cuisinart died after 2 years; given its cost we deemed it a delete.The controls are easy to read and straightforward. We also appreciate that it's not branded on the face with some weird, unintelligible name; it's not branded at all (thank you).The roasting basket works so well that we bought a second one of these as a back-up for the inevitable failure that looms in all of our futures...lol. We're vegan, so we'll never use the rotisserie for a chicken, but for all you conventional food lovers, the rotisserie really works.We only have a single nit and that is with the air fryer basket - it's too big to fit correctly into the drip pan, but it will drip into said pan when placed on a separate rack position. From our previous oven we have a slightly smaller air fryer basket that fits perfectly into the drip pan, but not everyone has all of these parts.We also find that toasting in any of these countertop ovens requires a different rack/pan, which is available in stainless here on Amazon - search for the "Joyfair 12.5 inch baking pan" with rack. It comes in different sizes to fit any countertop toaster/airfryer with a mesh rack instead of a straight wire rack.NB - read the manual for rack placement because it matters for correct cooking. We placed our morning millet crisp on the wrong rack and discovered that it wasn't toasted correctly - burnt on the edges and raw in the middle. We almost sent it back until we re-read the rack placement instructions. Aha! Toasting happens evenly on the middle rack placement as instructed. Duh-oh.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this small oven for my powder coating of small objects. I put it through the tests in the past 2 days and it functions as should be. The preheat is in minutes, temperatures are pretty accurate, as is the timer. I use a silicone cookie sheet cover on the flat plate to avoid any sticking from the powder coat, with perfect results. This oven is light enough to carry in one hand under the arm, so I would classify it as easily "Portable".The only negative would be the very short cord, meaning the manufacture wants it close to the outlet for amperage draw over the marginal cord gauge. Price is right, keeps me out of the wife's oven and out of trouble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small toaster oven that serves its purpose
reviews.reviewText: Simple controls - there are knobs for temperature and timing. The printed nubmers are difficult to read because they are dim. 1 star off for that. Temperature control is good. I use this only for reheating, so I can't comment about its toasting capability.Interesting mechanism - as you open the door the metal grid is lowered and pulls out partially. This makes it easy to put in items and retrieve them. If you are using a vessel make sure its sides are not too high or it may hit the protective grid over the top heating element. There also is a second element on the bottom.One other thing: The tray that is included is quite small - 6" x 9" so you can only fit, for example, *one* slice of pizza on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for time saving !
reviews.reviewText: pretty good oven, I've cooked pizzas to perfection roasted brussle sprouts and even salmon it all turned out great in my opinion. but the trick for me is I set the timer and temp and I watch and check on my food if I notice it's too hot turn it down..not cooking fast enough turn it up. it's never going to be as great as a full size oven but you can cook some pretty good meals if you just keep an eye on your food.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good little toaster oven
reviews.reviewText: I use this little toaster over all of the time. I rarely turn my big oven on. I am giving the toaster oven a 3 out of 5 because even though it works really well it is on the smaller side. Also the line does not come with differnet pans so you have to make sure when you are buying extra pans and racks that you pay close attention to the side. Also it has a setting for bake, toast and broil but the toast setting is not separate from the bake setting so you really have to watch what temp you have the "oven" set at when you are toasting something. Other than those minor things the product is great value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great, I made homemade biscuits this morning. Be advised the handle will be hot and you need to learn your timer setting, but overall I am well pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Either Toast Does't Toast Or It Gets Burnt,
reviews.reviewText: This Toaster Is New But Doesn't Work, Tried For 3 weeks to Just Toast, There is a temp Control from 150 to 450 It Is A Shame, But This Toaster Is Just Not Usable, Timer Is To Tough Figure Out Also,, It Is Between 1 And 10 Minutes or more time More To Do Toasting, The Reviews are great But In I Will Just Buy A Different Toaster I Purchased 3 years Ago I Won't Send This Back Also. Either It Does't Toast With Low Heat Setting Or Burns It With High Heat Setting, Supposed To Be A Good Toaster But Not This One.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Way Better Than I Expected !
reviews.reviewText: I was prepared for the worst, being this is one of the cheapest toaster ovens you can buy. I braced for the possibility that the inside could rust after it's first use like my last toaster from B&D did, but that didn't happen ! I've been using it every day since it arrived two weeks ago and it's staying clean. The other thing I like is that it heats evenly with no cold spots. Both heating elements stay a solid orange all the way across. The operation is simple and straight forward. It's so light weight that it feels cheap when you pick it up but when it's in place on the counter top it's door and rack operations are sturdy. One thing I noticed, when I first used it, the door didn't want to rest all of the way down when open. It wanted to spring back closed. So I very lightly forced it all of the way open where the handle rested on the counter when fully open. Nothing broke and it works like it should now. Overall I'm very happy with my purchase.
J'aime beaucoup ce modele tres bien il prends pas trop de place .il cuit tres bien .pizza et Le poulet en cuisse
Small but powerful. Lets see the perfomance over time. Nice size

reviews.reviewTitle: Simple. But burner is a bit too concentrated.
reviews.reviewText: Simple and compact. Very small, (but thats what I was looking for). Main issue i have with it is that the burner on the bottom is way too close to where the bread sits and one spot burns on the bread. If i turn the heat down or take it out sooner, that one spot is the only part toasted, while the rest is soft. I had to put ton foil on the burner so it wasn't putting direct heat on the bread.
cannot read the numbers on the dials
